TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements. These values are used in the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 完整是預設值，並指定傳回的項目包含的完整參考基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 沒有指定傳回的項目不必參考基礎的 UI 中，包含快取的資訊。
某些作業，在元素上，這類<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.SetFocus%2A>，需要完整的參考; 嘗試執行這些上並沒有任何項目會導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
使用 「 無可能會更有效率時需要只有屬性，因為它避免額外負荷參與設定完整的參考。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何將模式設定上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。
[!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information. This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
